checkpoint.manager.datamodel
Class CheckpointManager

java.lang.Object
  checkpoint.manager.datamodel.CheckpointManager

public class CheckpointManager
extends java.lang.Object

The Class CheckpointManager. Main management class to the underlying data model. Manages the processing and updating of data from user input via the GUI into the data files.

Author:
Samuel Jackson (slj11@aber.ac.uk)

Parameters:
